Name: Idle Wasteland
About the game: Idle Wasteland is an Incremental Idle RPG in a post-apocalyptic world. You stand alone in the wasteland and must fight monsters, salvage resources and refine materials to survive! Key features: - Defeat monsters, gain power, unlock new zones and hunt down bounties! - Gather a large variety of loot and discover rare salvaging spawns! - Use resources gathered to refine materials, craft permanent power-ups and suit upgrades, enhance item efficiency and more! - Unlock and cast fighting and utility spells, discover unique essence to enhance your spells! - Hunt 20+ mutant creatures that appear during gameplay, each with their own loot table! - Earn and level up companions to unlock powerful bonuses! - Complete various Tasks and Missions to unlock stat enhancements! - Find and use items to make yourself more powerful and provide helpful utilities! - Idle Wasteland has a plethora of content, play the game to discover much more!
